issue.title: [C++] Implement casts from List<A> to List<B>, where a cast function is defined from any A to B
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-1487](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-1487). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
If a cast rule for the child type is not implemented, the failure should occur during kernel selection rather than at kernel evaluation time.
